revised_title: Research Techniques in the Man-Made Fibre Industry
tldr: The article describes the research department of Courtaulds Limited, a company involved in the man-made fibre industry. It discusses the various industrial processes, challenges, and research techniques used in the production of viscose and cellulose acetate continuous filament yarns and staple fibres. The article also highlights the importance of large-scale experimentation and the extensive facilities required for the research and development of new fibres.
